special: The Vancouver mulligan is now legal in Duel Commander.

explanations.Sensei's Divining Top: The card was creating a lot of fuss because of its power and its impact on the games' durations. During those 6 month being unbanned, Top didn't seem to have any positive impact on the format, powering up decks that were already dominant decks. That's why Sensei's divining top is now banned.
